(OH, I thought the newcomers at the base were whoever was with 
Diamond.)

Bounty easily evaded Darkmouses shots but in trying to get inside 
he'd picked up to much velosity. "BAMMMMMM" echo'd through the 
Predacon base as Bounty slammed head first into the door.

He rolled over got to his feat and transformed. "There are always 
other ways to get inside." he hopped backwards avoiding autogun fire 
as he rethunk his position.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> (They haven't posted yet.)
> 
> DarkMouse:
> She hit the floor and rolled onto her back. She drew her gun and 
> fired on Bounty. She then jumped up and ran inside, closing th 
> entrance doors behind her. "That bot has lost his logic circuits." 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Bounty laughed as the autoguns blasted everywhere he was. "Nice 
try 
> > criminals but fireing on a temporal agent is a crime punishable 
by 
> > death, your life is forfeit." he swooped down firing eyebeams 
> toward 
> > Darkmouse as he flew toward the entrance.
> > 
> > (Where are the new arrivals?)
> >
